lom:description.lom:string:
MIT Open course website that features a full set of lecture slides, assignments and course notes in the readings section. "This is an introductory course in Discrete Mathematics oriented toward Computer Science and Engineering. The course divides roughly into thirds:
1. Fundamental Concepts of Mathematics: Definitions, Proofs, Sets, Functions, Relations 2. Discrete Structures: Modular Arithmetic, Graphs, State Machines, Counting 3. Discrete Probability Theory."
